mapper.update: update line set line_name = #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_province_number = #{beginProvinceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_city_number = #{beginCityNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midpoint_province_number = #{midpointProvinceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midpoint_city_number = #{midpointCityNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination_province_number = #{destinationProvinceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination_city_number = #{destinationCityNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ransport_price = #{ransportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select line_id, line_name, begin_province_number, begin_city_number, midpoint_province_number, midpoint_city_number, destination_province_number, destination_city_number, ransport_price, notes from line where line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select line_id, line_name, begin_province_number, begin_city_number, midpoint_province_number, midpoint_city_number, destination_province_number, destination_city_number, ransport_price, notes from line
